turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hi there, what would you like to do today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to order a larg eggnog latte.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: large eggnog latte ok

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: which coffee shop would you like to order from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: the one on McCarran in Reno.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: mccarran reno you said?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok would this be for peets or starbucks.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: starbucks, got it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what size and what type of milk do you want in your drink?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Large normal milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok so I am guessing Venti size with whole milk is that good.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, any additional flavoring for you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: extra caramel.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: extra caramel sauce on top is that right.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok let me repeat all that for you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so we have 1 order of Venti eggnog latte with whole milk and extra caramel sauce on top?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: thats with starbuck from mccarran reno right.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Right.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: perfect, drink has been ordered at the local store and will be ready for pickup shortly.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your receipt will be sent to your mobile device via text message.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: do you need anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, enjoy your coffee.
